contextId.information: This is a mild way for Jesus to say that he will die to protect his sheep. AT: "I die for the sheep" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: I lay down my life for the sheep

contextId.information: This is a mild way for Jesus to say he will die and then will become alive again. AT: "I allow myself to die in order that I may bring myself back to life" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_euphemism]])
contextId.quote: I lay down my life so that I may take it again
